vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Syrians living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.10.23;
son of: Aram (H0758);
brother of: Uz (H5780), Hul (H2343) and Gether (H1666); also called Meshech at 1Ch.1.17;
Also named: me.shekh (מֶ֫שֶׁךְ "Meshech" H4902J)
§ Mash = "drawn out"
one of the sons of Aram; also 'Meshech'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Aram; descendiente de Sem
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪施 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "拉出"
亞蘭一個的兒子; 也作 '米設'{#創 10:23|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛施 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "拉出"
亚兰一个的儿子; 也作 '米设'{#创 10:23|}
